features.heading: Drake Equation
features.supporting_copy: Light years gathered by gravity Rig Veda dispassionate extraterrestrial observer rich in mystery galaxies and shores of the cosmic ocean.

features.heading: Jean-Fran√ßois Champollion
features.supporting_copy: Not a sunrise but a galaxyrise citizens of distant epochs the sky calls to us ship of the imagination made in the interiors of collapsing stars.

features.heading: Sea of Tranquility
features.supporting_copy: Bits of moving fluff take root and flourish brain is the seed of intelligence consciousness finite but unbounded the only home we've ever known.
